-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapse0001.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) AS [result]

--To see Columns info
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://synapse0001.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
'

--To set column into like datatype
EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'
SELECT
     *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''https://synapse0001.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'',
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0'',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT,
        Borough VARCHAR(15),
        Zone VARCHAR(50),
        service_zone VARCHAR(15)
    )AS [result]
'

--To Check Collaction
SELECT NAME,collation_name FROM sys.databases
--Specify UTF-8 collation for columns

SELECT
     *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapse0001.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) 
    WITH (
        LocationID SMALLINT ,
        Borough VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        Zone VARCHAR(50) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) COLLATE Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8
    )AS [result]

--Create database
CREATE DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery 

ALTER DATABASE nyc_taxi_discovery collate Latin1_General_100_CI_AI_SC_UTF8

--Read subset columns which dosent have headers

SELECT
     *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://synapse0001.dfs.core.windows.net/nyc-taxi-data/raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRST_ROW = 1,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        Location_id SMALLINT 1,
        Borough VARCHAR(15) 2 ,
        Zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    )AS [result]

--Create External datasource
CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE nyc_taxi_data
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapse0001.dfs.core.windows.net/'
)

SELECT
     *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/taxi_zone_without_header.csv',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIRST_ROW = 1,
        FIELDTERMINATOR = ',',
        ROWTERMINATOR = '\n'
    ) 
    WITH (
        Location_id SMALLINT 1,
        Borough VARCHAR(15) 2 ,
        Zone VARCHAR(50) 3,
        service_zone VARCHAR(15) 4
    )AS [result]

-- find location of external data sources

SELECT name,LOCATION FROM sys.external_data_sources
